name: Livement
headline: Livement makes selling tickets for events easy and safe for organizers
description: Livement (Boletomóvil in Latin America) transforms event ticketing with effortless and secure transactions. Our solution relies on controlling both the primary and secondary market, putting an end to ticket fraud and scalping. We empower event organizers with exclusive control over the secondary market, preventing ticket reselling on other web platforms. This prioritizes genuine fans and ensures fair revenue sharing among stakeholders.

founders.name: Roberto Rey, Founder
founders.description: Technical founder trying to fix problems in LATAM

### Livement: Simplifying Ticket Sales in Mexico

Founded in 2016 and now part of Y Combinator's S16 batch, Livement (also known as Boletomóvil in Latin America) is on a mission to revolutionize event ticketing. Headquartered in Guadalajara, Mexico, Livement operates with a team of 45 dedicated employees, all committed to making the ticketing experience seamless and secure for event organizers.

#### The Mission

Livement aims to simplify ticket sales while ensuring safety for all parties involved. By controlling both the primary and secondary ticket markets, they tackle rampant issues like ticket fraud and scalping. This means that event organizers can maintain exclusive control over their tickets, preventing unauthorized reselling on other platforms. In doing so, Livement prioritizes genuine fans and ensures that revenue is shared fairly among all stakeholders.

#### What They Do

Livement caters to a broad range of events, including sports, concerts, theater productions, and more. Their platform allows event organizers to sell tickets easily and provides robust features like seat rentals. This focus on user experience translates into a more efficient selling process for organizers and a better buying experience for fans.

#### The Bigger Picture

In a market often plagued by problematic resale practices, Livement stands out by empowering event organizers rather than leaving them at the mercy of third-party sellers. The result? A safer, more equitable ticketing environment that fosters genuine fan engagement.

#### Connect with Livement

If you're an event organizer looking to streamline your ticket sales while ensuring a secure experience for your fans, you can get started with Livement on their website: [boletomovil.com](https://boletomovil.com). 

Their blend of technology and a fan-centric approach makes Livement a noteworthy player in the sports-tech and ticketing landscape. It’s not just about tickets; it’s about ensuring that every transaction is authentic and every fan's experience is as smooth as it should be.

With Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, Livement is well-positioned to continue growing in this space, enhancing the way events are experienced in Mexico and beyond.
